EV isolated method: EVs were isolated from 1 mL of plasma by SEC columns of polysaccharide resin (qEV 70 columns; IZON, Christchurch, New Zealand) following the company’s protocol. The EV-enriched fractions were collected. Subsequently, RNA was extracted from EVs by using the Plasma/Serum RNA Purification Mini Kit (Cat. 56100, Norgen Biotek, ON, Canada) as indicated in the manufacturer’s protocol.
